properties.description:
Reading a parquet file
Assignment done

content.query:
--select database
use nyx_taxi_discovery

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


--lookup at the datatypes
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'


--define columns and datatypes
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
with(
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
)AS trip_data_green_parquet;


--check whether datatypes got aplied
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    )
with(
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT
)AS trip_data_green_parquet;'



----------------------------------------------------------------------
/*
Assignment
----------
1. query from folders using wildcard characters
2. query from subfolders
3. use filename()
4. use filepath() function to select only from certain partitions
*/
----------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 1. query from folders using wildcard characters
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data_green_parquet


--2. query from subfolders
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data_green_parquet

--2nd way use more than on wildcard character
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data_green_parquet

--3. use filename() function
SELECT
    TOP 100
    trip_data_green_parquet.filename() as file_name ,
    trip_data_green_parquet.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data_green_parquet

--4. use filepath() function to select only from certain partitions
SELECT
    TOP 100
    trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(1) as year ,
    trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(2) as month ,
    trip_data_green_parquet.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data_green_parquet
WHERE trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(1) in ('2020') AND
      trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')


--count records from each file
SELECT
    trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(1) as year ,
    trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(2) as month ,
    COUNT(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data_green_parquet
WHERE trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(1) in ('2020') AND
      trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')
GROUP by trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(1), trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(2)
ORDER BY trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(1), trip_data_green_parquet.filepath(2)
